channel.title: Help on making a RS private server
channel.description:
I need a bit of help making a private server.
What I have is the RS source files, compiler...
So what I can do is make a server, after that, I have no idea how to connect to that server. I think I may need to download something else which has the run.bat
Well, this is what I did. I have the TESTscape source. That has all the .java and .class files and such. It also has compile.bat and runserver.bat. Compile runs the code and compiles it, then it goes to runserver.bat and starts up the server. Sometimes I get a could not connect to port 5555. Is it in use? error. I think for that I just need to retry or something. I think I know what to do for that. Then when the server is up, thats when I have the problem. I dont know how to connect to the server.
Is there a download which I can get that has everything in it? thanks BK

item.title: Help on making a RS private server
item.dc:creator: @barrikid barrikid
item.description:
@barrikid wrote:

dy3p8ntrkid:

Somewhere in your client files, maybe GUI.java you may find a no-ip server address, change it to your’s and maybe port numbers in your source, only thing I can think of, I’m still trying to get mine up too x.x

I dont have the client files. Is there a DL link? Atleast I know there isnt a GUI.java file

Im just wondering, Is there the new version of RS? like the one with summoning and construction?

Also, I tried that mopar website u were talking about pimped, but it didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: Help on making a RS private server

item.title: Help on making a RS private server
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Hmm, Go into Server.java, And search 5555; Change 5555 to 43594, Compile.
Then to connect, Just use www.moparisthebest.com (The official moparscape client) And just hit login.
I can’t find you a DL link atm. But I’ll try later.

Read full topic
item.source: Help on making a RS private server

item.title: Help on making a RS private server
item.dc:creator: @barrikid barrikid
item.description:
@barrikid wrote:

I need a bit of help making a private server.

What I have is the RS source files, compiler…

So what I can do is make a server, after that, I have no idea how to connect to that server. I think I may need to download something else which has the run.bat

Well, this is what I did.
I have the TESTscape source. That has all the .java and .class files and such. It also has compile.bat and runserver.bat. Compile runs the code and compiles it, then it goes to runserver.bat and starts up the server. Sometimes I get a could not connect to port 5555. Is it in use? error. I think for that I just need to retry or something. I think I know what to do for that. Then when the server is up, thats when I have the problem. I dont know how to connect to the server.

Is there a download which I can get that has everything in it? thanks
BK

Read full topic
